title: From Naiberi to Nairobi: how Kenya's melting pot capital was born – a cartoon
text:
The Illustrated City: From its rapid growth thanks to a railway to the transformative introduction of the smartphone, Nairobi has refused to remain the same

From Naiberi to Nairobi: how Kenya's melting pot capital was born – a cartoon

Victor Ndula is an editorial cartoonist and comic artist living in Nairobi, Kenya. More of his work can be found on Facebook, Twitter and on the Cartoon Movement website

If you’re an illustrator or graphic artist with an idea for The Illustrated City series, email us at Cities@theguardian.com

Follow Guardian Cities on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram to join the discussion, catch up on our best stories or sign up for our weekly newsletter
